original_title: Tibetan archivist preserves history in retirement
article_summary: Retired Tibetan archivist, Dadron, continues to preserve historical documents in Xizang, having spent 38 years restoring tens of thousands of precious archives. She trained in Beijing and Shanghai to learn restoration techniques and paper-pulp repair methods. The main focus of her work is to protect and repair damaged historical documents without supplementing missing information.</s>
